reportmanagement

Class PatientReportControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • reportmanagement.PatientReportControl

  • public class PatientReportControl
extends java.lang.Object
    The PatientReportControl class provides methods to generate various reports about patients, such as age distribution, diagnosis distribution, gender distribution, treatment distribution, and average age by diagnosis.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PatientReportControl(InitialDataPatient dataPatient)
      Constructs a PatientReportControl object with the specified patient data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayAgeDistribution()
      Displays the age distribution of patients in a bar chart format.
      void displayAverageAgeByDiagnosis()
      Displays the average age of patients by diagnosis.
      void displayDiagnosisDistribution()
      Displays the diagnosis distribution of patients in a sorted bar chart format.
      void displayGenderDistribution()
      Displays the gender distribution of patients in a bar chart format.
      void displayTreatmentDistribution()
      Displays the treatment distribution of patients in a sorted bar chart format.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
